About the Company: Ausom Enterprises ltd is a Total Packaging Solutions Provider Company.The company manufactures corrugated boxes , Wooden and Corrugated Pallets and offers Complete Palletized Solution to various exports all across India.Services offered by the company include Development of Consumer Packaging, Package development for Fragile Products,Development of Industrial Packaging, Packaging of Free Flowing Material and Total Diagnostic Study and Solutions
